metadata.dc:author: Cabra Lluva, R
Rico Blázquez, M
Yegler Velasco, M C
López Gómez, Y
Asenjo Esteve, A
metadata.dc:description: The authors make a detailed presentation about the steps to follow to ensure the patient is comfortable and that the execution of this technique is correct. The authors review the most important aspects, including asepsis and anesthesia, to prepare a wound for suturing and to make preparations for surgery. They also provide a brief description of the necessary surgical instruments and their characteristics.
metadata.dc:title: Cirugía en lesiones dérmicas superficiales (II de III). Procedimiento: preparación de la técnica.
[Surgery in superficial skin lesions (II of III). Procedure: technique preparation].
